<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> NEWS | Quarterly Helicopter Newsletter - Q1 2017 Issue 2016 proved to be one of the most economically challenging years in this millennium. Fortunately, the year is now behind us and we’re seeing some positive signs of industry stabilization. Specific to new OEM aircraft demand, it’s been communicated that some OEM’s have experienced higher order velocity in the second half of 2016 - which is excellent news. On the aftermarket side, we’ve seen deferments of some differentiating retrofits, modifications and upgrades continue, however, many operators have pushed forward and have configured their aircraft with enhanced safety equipment to comply with mandates and to increase operational capabilities.
Prior to HAI's HELI-EXPO, Honeywell will be releasing their Annual Buyer X survey, which is a great customer driven barometer of the industry’s near-term outlook. We look forward to sharing the results and are optimistic that 2017 indeed will be the year of industry stabilization.
We wish you a successful 2017 and look forward to seeing you in Dallas for HELI-EXPO.
Sincerely, Rick Angelo Director of Strategic Marketing: Global Commercial Helicopters
